channel.title: drop-www or yes-www? www.whonix.org -> whonix.org?
channel.description:
Why drop-www?
Because of HSTS vs double redirects, see: https://forums.whonix.org/t/no-clean-hsts-preload-dnssec/10255/10
`drop-www` vs `yes-www` security, considerations, references: [Dev/About Infrastructure - Kicksecure chapter drop-www vs yes-www in Kicksecure wiki](https://www.kicksecure.com/wiki/Dev/About_Infrastructure#drop-www_vs_yes-www)
(Whonix is based on Kicksecure.)

item.title: drop-www or yes-www? www.whonix.org -> whonix.org?
